messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Sandra's Thinking Workshops
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/3/03 3:53:53 PM, tmthomas@shaw.ca writes:  Nothing specific, though I think
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/3/03 3:53:53 PM, tmthomas@... writes:

<< Oh! Ah! Sandra! Any online essays on this topic? >>

Nothing specific, though I think several touch on it. Disposable Checklists,
maybe?

It's linked from http://sandradodd.com/articles
but since it's an HEM back-article page, I don't know the URL by memory.

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Sandra's Thinking Workshops
messages.msgSnippet: Oh!  Ah! Sandra!  Any online essays on this topic?  Pet topic of mine!! Esp. modes of knowing! ... -=-I m doing a different workshop on thinking at the Live
messages.messageBody:
Oh! Ah! Sandra! Any online essays on this topic? Pet topic of mine!! Esp. modes of knowing!

:O))


-=-I'm doing a different workshop on thinking at the Live and Learn conference
in South Carolina, about how ideas connect (and how to connect more of them).-=-
